homePageHero.title: AUTSAID Driving School - 15 years of experience and reliability!
homePageHero.description: Registration for the driving school is available 24/7 by leaving your application in the window. Our manager will contact you for sure.

onlinePageHero.title: Online Driving School
onlinePageHero.description: Good day, dear students of our online driving school. Due to the state of war in our country, the driving school conducts online classes. On this page, we provide links to set up the program required for online conferences.

howToGetStarted.title: Procedure for connecting the program:
howToGetStarted.step1: 1. Subscribe to the school's Viber group (to receive the conference ID and password before the session).
howToGetStarted.step2: 2. Download the ZOOM program to your computer (for iOS users, go to the App Store, search for ZOOM, and download; for Android users, go to the playMarket, find ZOOM, and download).
howToGetStarted.step3: 3. Open ZOOM (on a computer, tablet, or phone), press the - Join the Conference - button.
howToGetStarted.step4: 4. Enter the - Conference ID (you receive it before the session in the Viber group (format XXX-XXX-XXX)).
howToGetStarted.step5: 5. Enter the - Password (you receive it before the session in the Viber group (format XXXXXXX)).

form.title: Apply for Training
form.success_message: Congratulations! Your training application has been successfully submitted. Expect a call from our manager.
form.error_message: An error occurred. The form was not submitted.

tests.title: Tests
tests.description: Hello dear guests and students of our driving school. You have the opportunity to take exams, and independently purchase and study traffic rules using the instructions and links below.

heroDescription.description1: Welcome to the driving school in
heroDescription.description2: , we are waiting for you. Lessons are conducted in a dynamic and interesting form, where you will learn a lot of new things. We have a convenient location, cozy classrooms, and a professional team. Our teachers will teach you not only the rules of the road and the structure of the car but also address issues related to providing first aid, insurance, vehicle registration, and many other topics that may arise for a future driver.
heroDescription.description3: Our instructors will professionally and qualitatively tailor an individual program for each student, taking into account personal skills and abilities. The administrators of the AUTSAID driving school are always ready to advise you by phone on choosing a training category, the start date of training, submitting the necessary documents, promotions, and other questions that may interest you. Training at the AUTSAID driving school will allow you to quickly master the skills of driving, confidently hold the steering wheel, and feel the vehicle. AUTSAID driving school is waiting for you and wishes you pleasant learning.

questions.how many lessons: How many lessons do I need to learn to drive?
questions.is fuel included: Is fuel included in the practical lesson price?
questions.additional practice: I already have a driver's license, can I take additional practice sessions?
questions.installment payment: Is installment payment possible for training at the driving school?
questions.not included fee: What is not included in the training fee?
questions.theoretical course online: Is online training possible for the theoretical course?
questions.study from abroad: Can I finish the driving school while being abroad?
questions.medical reference: What should be in the medical reference?
questions.where to get medical reference: Where can I get medical reference form 083/o?
questions.practice on weekend: Is it possible to practice driving on weekends?

answers.how many lessons: The uniqueness of practical training at the AUTSAID driving school in Dnipro lies in the fact that the instructor develops an individual training program for driving, taking into account the initial skills and abilities of each student. This allows more effective completion of the training program! Our recommendation is at least 20 lessons! The result is that you can drive a car safely! Saving money on driving lessons now can cost you dearly later! After all, the price may be human life.
answers.is fuel included: Yes, the price of fuel is included in the price of practical training.
answers.additional practice: For drivers who want to improve their driving skills, additional practical sessions are possible. Yes, it is possible.
answers.installment payment: The driving school can provide a service such as installment payment for training. Each case is individual and can be discussed with the driving school administrator.
answers.not included fee: Additional expenses for driving school students will be the purchase of a traffic rules manual.
answers.theoretical course online: Yes, considering the current circumstances, it is possible.
answers.study from abroad: No, you must be present at both theoretical (offline or online) and practical classes.
answers.medical reference: The list of documents you submit to the driving school includes a medical reference form 083/o.
answers.where to get medical reference: There are specialized medical commissions for drivers located in medical institutions in your city.
answers.practice on weekend: Yes, the driving school operates on weekends for your convenience.

blog.title: Blog
blog.description: Everything related to training for categories A, B, C, D, E. Articles useful for students of the best driving school.
